Detailed Description

This class represents a down sample method that has a designated skip value in the row and column, and it skips the data in between.

The row and column skip factors divide the sub-window into non-overlapping sample windows. The upper left corner pixel of each sample window is the down sampled value for that window.

For a more comprehensive discussion of the merits and drawbacks of this type of down sampling, please refer to the NITF manual.
